entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Alright everyone, thanks for joining. Today we're looking at the Vercel AI SDK integration with our local Ollama setup.

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: I've been testing the `streamText` function. It works great, but I'm worried about the latency on the local Llama 3.2 model when running on the dev laptops.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: That's a fair point. We might need to look into quantization or just sticking to smaller 1B or 3B parameter models for the local dev environment.

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: I'll take an action item to benchmark the 3B model vs the 8B today and report back on Slack by 5 PM.

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: Also, regarding the UI, are we using the `useChat` hook or building a custom state manager?

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: The SDK's `useChat` hook is robust. Let's not reinvent the wheel. Marcus, can you have the prototype UI ready for the demo this Friday?

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: Friday? Yeah, I can commit to that. I'll push the branch by noon on Friday so you can review it before the meeting.

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: Wait, I need the final JSON schema for the data extraction module before Marcus finishes. Jenny, when will the model benchmarks be done?

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: Like I said, I'll have the data by 5 PM today. David, I'll send you the Zod schema definitions first thing tomorrow morning, say 9 AM?

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: 9 AM works. That gives me enough time to integrate the structured output logic. I'll have the full extraction service completed by Monday morning.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Great. One more thing—the security team flagged the local Ollama API endpoint. They want a basic auth proxy in front of it.

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: I can handle the proxy setup. It's a quick Nginx config. I'll do that right after this call and it should be live in 30 minutes.

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: Oh, Sarah, I almost forgot. I need you to approve the budget increase for the Vercel Pro plan. We're hitting the limit on concurrent edge functions.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: I'll look into the billing dashboard. If it looks reasonable, I'll hit approve by the end of the day.

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: Wait, before we drop, does the 3B model handle the multi-turn conversation history correctly? If not, Monday's deadline might slip.

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: Good catch. I'll include a multi-turn stress test in my 5 PM report today to confirm.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Excellent. Thanks everyone. Let's touch base on Slack if anything changes.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Actually, one more thing before we go. The design team sent over new Figma mockups. Can someone review them by end of day tomorrow?

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: I'll take a look. I'll add feedback in the Figma comments by Wednesday evening.

entries.name: Emma Wilson
entries.text: Hi everyone, sorry I'm late. I just joined. Sarah, I'll have the documentation for the new API endpoints ready by Thursday afternoon.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Thanks Emma. That's perfect. David, can you coordinate with Emma on the schema docs for the extraction module?

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: Sure. Emma, I'll send you a draft of the schema by end of day tomorrow. You can merge it into the docs.

entries.name: Emma Wilson
entries.text: Sounds good. I'll have the full API docs published by Thursday 3 PM.

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: One more thing—I need to schedule the load testing for next week. Sarah, can you approve the staging environment access for the QA team by Friday?

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: I'll put in the access request today. It should be approved by Friday morning.

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: Alright, I think we're good. I'll summarize the action items in Slack and tag everyone. Have a great afternoon.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Quick follow-up call. The deployment fix worked. Let's discuss the error monitoring setup for production.

entries.name: Tom Harris
entries.text: I'll set up Sentry for the Express app. I'll have the error tracking configured by end of day today.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Perfect. And we need log aggregation. Who can own that?

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: I'll look into Datadog or CloudWatch. I'll have a proposal ready for the sprint planning tomorrow.

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: The extraction service is done. I've pushed to staging. Can someone run a smoke test before we merge to main?

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: I'll run the smoke tests this afternoon. I'll report back in Slack by 4 PM.

entries.name: Emma Wilson
entries.text: The API docs are live. I've added a changelog section. I'll update it weekly every Monday morning.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Great. One more—the legal team needs the DPA signed. I'll get that done by Friday. Can someone from engineering review the data retention section?

entries.name: David Ross
entries.text: I'll review the DPA. I'll send feedback to legal by Thursday EOD.

entries.name: Marcus Vance
entries.text: The Nginx proxy is live. I've documented the config in the runbook. I'll share the link in Slack after this call.

entries.name: Jenny Kim
entries.text: Staging access was approved. QA can start load testing next Monday. I'll coordinate the schedule with them by tomorrow.

entries.name: Tom Harris
entries.text: I need the production database credentials for the monitoring setup. Sarah, can you approve the 1Password access request by noon?

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: I'll approve it right after this call. Should be done in 10 minutes.

entries.name: Emma Wilson
entries.text: I'll create a runbook for the new API. I'll have a draft ready for review by Wednesday.

entries.name: Sarah Chen
entries.text: Perfect. Let's wrap up. Tom, please add the Sentry dashboard to our status page. Everyone else, see you at sprint planning.

entries.name: Tom Harris
entries.text: Will do. I'll have it linked by end of day.
